text:
February 27, 1958
F. W. Faxon Company, Inc.
83 Francis Street
Boston 15, Massachusetts
Gentlemen:
I am returning to you the subscription order for NAEB TV Research Fact
Sheets from the Serials Department Library, University of North Caro¬
lina and from the State College of Washington, Pullman. As you will
note by the enclosed mimeographed letter, the Fact Sheets are now
incorporated in the NAEB Journal, and I believe these two schools al¬
ready subscribe to that publication*
If there are any questions regarding this subscription(s), please let
me know.
Sincerely,
(Mrs .Judith B. Gans
Secretary
Enclosures (subscription blanks,
F.S.letter,
Ind. Mem. application)
